mapper.select: SELECT return_goodsfacility_info_code AS returGoodsfacilityInfoCode ,goodsfacility_rental_code AS goodsfacilityRentalCode ,goodsfacility_code AS goodsfacilityCode ,classify_goodsfacility AS classifyGoodsfacility ,citizen_id AS citizenId ,is_requested_to_return_as_delivery AS isRequestedToReturnAsDelivery ,overdue_days AS overdueDays ,adminagency_code AS adminagencyCode ,functionary_id AS functionaryId ,state_goods_code AS stateGoodsCode ,date_return_check AS dateReturnCheck FROM return_goodsfacility_info ORDER BY return_goodsfacility_info_code DESC
